title: Bora-Hansgrohe Downplays Contract Rumors: ‘We will be Linked to Just About Everyone who Drinks a Red Bull’
content:
Red Bull's arrival is 'huge' moment for cycling: 'Maybe it will turn on some lights for some other big brands.'

Read the full article at Bora-Hansgrohe Downplays Contract Rumors: ‘We will be Linked to Just About Everyone who Drinks a Red Bull’ on Velo.
author: ahood
